questions.quote: We're going to the circus. One of her old Olympic teammates is an acrobat. I don't even feel like going out.
Anyway, Beth and her new husband Arnie have listed me a reference for an adoption agency. They're trying to get a baby.
No, Julie, Julie, don't insult me. You know, what difference does it make who pays for lunch. It's totally meaningless.
Oh Elaine....What do you think an enraptured female fan of mine might say?
So how'd you come up with the idea for the belt-less trench coat?
Nobody does. You know, nobody knows what to do. You just close your eyes and you hope for the best. I really think they're happy if you just make an effort.
No, no no no, George! A deal's a deal. I want you to have it!
All right, so what's the penalty here? Let's just pay the fine or something and get the hell out of here.
Jerry, you stand on the threshold to the magical world of sensual delights that most men dare not dream of!
Yeah, A big salad. Very good. Actually it was too big. Ha ha ha Wht?
